task.title: Displaying and hiding toolbars
task.shortdesc: When you start ZWCAD classic interface at the first time, multiple toolbars are displayed. ZWCAD provides more than a dozen toolbars, which you can customize by adding and deleting tools in both

context.p: classic and ribbon interfaces. You can also move and resize toolbars, and you can create new toolbars. You can use a shortcut menu to display or hide toolbars.
To choose which toolbars to display

step.cmd: Execute TOOLBAR command to open the Select Toolbars dialog box.
Choose the toolbars youwant to display, andthen click OK.

result.p: TIP Right-clickanywhere on a docked toolbar to display the toolbar shortcut menu, and then choose Toolbars.
